mapper.select: SELECT act.*, count(c.id) as commentCnt FROM ( SELECT a.*, ct.title as category FROM `article` a LEFT JOIN category ct ON a.category_id = ct.id WHERE a.member_id = #{id} AND a.status = #{status} ) act LEFT JOIN comment c ON act.id = c.article_id GROUP BY act.id ORDER BY register_date DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{numOfRecords}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article(member_id, category_id, title, content, register_date, nation) VALUES(#{memberId}, #{categoryId}, #{title}, #{content}, NOW(), #{nation})
INSERT INTO article(member_id, category_id, title, content, register_date, nation, status) VALUES(#{memberId}, #{categoryId}, #{title}, #{content}, NOW(), #{nation}, "TEMP")
mapper.select: SELECT am.*, count(c.id) as commentCnt FROM ( SELECT a.*, m.email, m.id as memberId FROM article a INNER JOIN `member` m ON a.member_id = m.id WHERE a.id = #{id} ) am LEFT JOIN comment c ON am.id = c.article_id GROUP BY am.id
mapper.update: UPDATE article SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, nation = #{nation}, update_date = NOW() WHERE id = #{id};
